Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
``` DM (Binance)
Nov 1, 10:11 CST
Hello,
Thank you for your inquiry.
We have investigated the information provided and we can't see how it is related to Binance.
In order for us to continue the investigation please provide the following documentation:

- A police report including information of the Police officer (Full name, phone number, email address, badge ID/photo ID) investigating the incident reported and official seal of the law enforcement authority
- The victim must go through KYC verification on https://www.binance.com/login.html
- Filled out hacking report form (Attached). Description of how the hack happened, evidence and detailed (clickable) blockchain links of all transactions involved
After receiving the above-mentioned documentation, we will cooperate with law enforcement. If you cannot provide the documents requested, we are very sorry but Binance cannot handle your request.
Thank you for your understanding and continued patronage.
Sincerely,
The Binance Support Team```

Author: house#8741
Content:
What surprises me is that (judging by your reaction) you may have expected more from them, or any exchange for that matter.
Truly, I feel your pain Genie and can only wish for you something good will come from this shitty situation.
This is a wake up call for all of us to remain vigilant and not rest on our laurels ... for if it can happen to one of our smartest, it can happen to anyone of us.
Sending good vibes your way @ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢
